description: Stunning 3-Bed, 2.5-Bath Corner Townhome in Mount Pleasant! Beautifully designed 3-level corner unit offering 1,408 sf of modern living in one of Vancouver’s most desirable neighborhoods. The home features an open-concept main floor with 9’ ceilings, engineered hardwood flooring throughout, and large windows providing excellent natural light. The contemporary kitchen is equipped with custom cabinetry, quartz countertops, SS appliances, a gas stove, and plenty of storage. Enjoy the private patio on the main level, ideal for entertaining, & a view deck off the top-floor loft style bedroom. Prime location with a Walk Score of 94, steps to parks, shops, cafes, restaurants, and transit. Just a 5-minute drive Downtown. A must-see! Book your private showing.
